__TOC__


{{https://launchpadlibrarian.net/189586435/ubuntu-us-or_logo.png | logo | align=left}}  Ubuntu Oregon is a !LoCo community which is focused on growing the use of and contribution to the Ubuntu family in the rainy state of Oregon. Membership is open to anyone with an interest in Ubuntu who commits to abide by the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/about/about-ubuntu/conduct|Ubuntu Code of Conduct]]</nowiki>. Ubuntu Oregon is delighted to present its application for verification at this time.
